content: p l y m o u t h y a r n® f681 free pattern with our compliments find inspiration www plymouthyarn com gina chevron hat to fit average adult head 20 ¼ circumference materials gina 2 50g balls color 8 gauge 19 sts 20 row = 4 in 16 st rib us size 10 6mm needle after blocking needles/notions us size 10 6mm - 16 circular and dpns 1 st marker 16 st rib multiple of 16 sts round 1 k all sts round 2 *yo k6 sl 1 k2tog psso k6 yo k1 repeat from * across repeat these 2 rnds for pattern st begin with circular long tail co 96 sts join in the round and pm work in 1x1 rib k1 st p 1 st for 2 work 16 st rib until hat measures 8 from co edge end having worked pattern st round 2 decrease for crown switch to dpns when there are too few number of sts to fit comfortably decrease round 1 *k6 sl1-k2tog-psso k7 repeat from * 84 sts on needle decrease round 2 *yo k5 sl1-k2tog-psso k5 yo k1 repeat from * decrease round 3 *k5 sl1-k2tog-psso k6 repeat from * 72 sts on needle decrease round 4 *yo k4 sl1-k2tog-psso k4 yo k1 repeat from * decrease round 5 *k4 sl1-k2tog-psso k5 repeat from * 60 sts on needle decrease round 6 *yo k3 sl1-k2tog-psso k3 yo k1 repeat from * across decrease round 7 *k3 sl1-k2tog-psso k4 repeat from * 48 sts on needle decrease round 8 *yo k2 s11-k2tog-psso k2 yo k1 repeat from * decrease round 9 *k2 sl1-k2tog-psso k3 repeat from * 36 sts on needle decrease round 10 *yo k1 sl1-k2tog-psso k1 yo k1 repeat from * decrease round 11 *k1 sl1-k2tog-psso k2 repeat from * 24 sts on needle decrease round 12 *yo sl1-k2tog-psso yo k1 repeat from * decrease round 13 *sl1-k2tog-psso k1 repeat from * 12 sts on needle cut yarn and draw through rem sts fasten_off and weave in all ends block ©2015 plymouth yarn company 091815vle designed by vanessa ewing abbreviations beg= begin ning co= cast on cont= continue decrease= decrease dpns= double pointed needles k= knit k2tog= knit two sts together p= purl pm= place marker psso= pass slipped stitch over rem= remain ing repeat= repeat rs= right side ssk = slip 1 st as if to knit slip a second st as if to knit knit them together through the back loop sl= slip st s = stitch es st st = stockinette st decrease = together yo= yarn over
